original_text: And when they had set them in the midst, they inquired, “By what power or by what name did you do this?”
korean_text: 사도들을 가운데 세우고 묻되 너희가 무슨 권세와 누구의 이름으로 이 일을 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And when they had set them in the midst,
“By what power or by what name did you do this?”
sentences.korean_translation: “너희가 무슨 권능과 무슨 이름으로 이 일을 행하였느냐?”
